analysis.description:
HeartBoutToken.constructor (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#212-224) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(total == ERC20migrate(_migrationSource).totalSupply())

Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol:
	Contract HeartBoutToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#179)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Reentrancy in HeartBoutToken.constructor (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#212-224):
	External calls:
	- balances[0x80da2Af3A3ED3Ecd165D7aC76b4a0C10D2deCB13] = ERC20migrate(_migrationSource).balanceOf(0xbAc36D24b6641434C7cE8E48F89e79E1fb6bd497) (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#213-215)
	- balance = ERC20migrate(_migrationSource).balanceOf(_holders[i]) (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#220-221)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#223-224)

HeartBoutToken.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#212) shadows:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#9-10)

HeartBoutToken.constructor has external calls inside a loop:
	- balance = ERC20migrate(_migrationSource).balanceOf(_holders[i]) (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#220-221)

Reentrancy in HeartBoutToken.constructor (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#212-224):
	External calls:
	- balances[0x80da2Af3A3ED3Ecd165D7aC76b4a0C10D2deCB13] = ERC20migrate(_migrationSource).balanceOf(0xbAc36D24b6641434C7cE8E48F89e79E1fb6bd497) (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#213-215)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/19/0xf0d8f9deeceb881c269854617c9bed6ed2e1530b.sol#219-224)
